title: 独立世界格式
txt_content:
我完全按照格式独立（这个也是别人帮我弄的，我自己弄的一样也都会失败）
mirrors:
        # Worlds listed here have their settings mirrored in their children.
        # The first element 'world' is the main worlds name, and is the parent world.
        # subsequent elements 'world_nether' and 'world_the_end' are worlds which will use
        # the same user/groups files as the parent.
        # the element 'all_unnamed_worlds' specifies all worlds that aren't listed, and automatically mirrors them to it's parent.
        # Each child world can be configured to mirror the 'groups', 'users' or both files from its parent.
        world:
          world_nether:
          - users
          - groups
          world_the_end:
          - users
          - groups
        world2:
          RPG:
          - users
          - groups
          maoxian:
          - users
          - groups


这就是别人帮我弄的！！
然后我发现这个除了下面那两个我要独立其余不用独立的世界也一起独立了然后我就这样做
mirrors:
        # Worlds listed here have their settings mirrored in their children.
        # The first element 'world' is the main worlds name, and is the parent world.
        # subsequent elements 'world_nether' and 'world_the_end' are worlds which will use
        # the same user/groups files as the parent.
        # the element 'all_unnamed_worlds' specifies all worlds that aren't listed, and automatically mirrors them to it's parent.
        # Each child world can be configured to mirror the 'groups', 'users' or both files from its parent.
      world:
          world_nether:
          - users
          - groups
          world_the_end:
          - users
          - groups
          all_unnamed_worlds:
          - users
          - groups
      world2:
          RPG:
          - users
          - groups
          maoxian:
          - users
          - groups


大家很容易就可以看出更改了哪里然后开服然后全服就没权限了(意味着编辑错误,失败)

顺带一句我在主机上编辑文本用notepad++
目视和对准都是有空行的
然后直接复制下来确有些没空行什么的
求解。。

replies.txt_content:
注解一下。。
第一个那别人帮忙弄的那个的例子里
大家会看到
world:
 world（后面省略)只空了一个。。可是事实上我在云主机上用notepad++编辑的时候看到的是空2格
复制过来后就变成空一格了。。
我去没人回答下吗？哪怕不会顶个贴都好啊！！！

replies.author: Hong-Jian

你这是废话。。
